definitions.definition: Shots from a gun or guns, typically creating loud report .
examples: Let's hide in the trees to avoid the gunfire .
Sergeant, direct your gunfire toward that copse of trees.

definitions.definition: The use of gunpowder-type weapons, mainly cannon, as opposed to swords or bayonets.
examples: Killing people became much easier and faster once armies started using gunfire .

definitions.definition: The time of firing of the morning gun or the evening gun .
Tea , a cup of tea, especially one served early in the morning before first parade.

main_definition: Shots from a gun or guns, typically creating loud report .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly military ) The use of gunpowder-type weapons, mainly cannon, as opposed to swords or bayonets.
( military ) The time of firing of the morning gun or the evening gun .
( army slang ) Tea , a cup of tea, especially one served early in the morning before first parade.
